usePermit(address,address,bytes,uint256,.notice: Validates an EIP-712 permit signature and marks it as used.

usedNonces(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of used nonces for replay protection: user => nonce => used

userdoc.notice: Manages EIP-712 signature-based permissions for secure offchain-triggered actions.         Users can sign typed data authorizing the ActionExecutor (or other contracts) to perform specific actions.

documentation.text: @notice Mapping of used nonces for replay protection: user => nonce => used
